name: The National portfolio includes Bridge organisations and organisations previously referred to as National youth music organisations. The organisations that are funded to deliver National youth music activity are:
National Youth Brass Band of Great Britain
National Youth Choirs of Great Britain
National Youth Orchestra of Great Britain
The National portfolio is made up of 663 organisations that hold 665 funding agreements. Changes since the announcements in July 2014 are:
Commonword has been included in the portfolio (finalisation of three year funding agreement pending)
English National Opera, firstsite and National Children's Orchestra of Great Britain have not entered the portfolio
The Southampton Nuffield Theatre Trust will also be the recipient for the grant offered to Southampton City Council (completion of a novation agreement between the two organisations pending)
Live & Local Ltd  will also be the recipient for the grant offered to Nottinghamshire County Council (completion of a novation agreement between the two organisations pending)
